NAME: No Poverty
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: End poverty in all its forms everywhere.

NAME: Zero Hunger
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture.

NAME: Good Health and Well-Being
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages.

NAME: Quality Education
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.

NAME: Gender Equality
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

NAME: Clean Water and Sanitation
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

NAME: Affordable and Clean Energy
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all.

NAME: Decent Work and Economic Growth
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all.

NAME: Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation.

NAME: Reduced Inequalities
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Reduce inequality within and among countries.

NAME: Sustainable Cities and Communities
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable.

NAME: Responsible Consumption and Production
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns.

NAME: Climate Action
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.

NAME: Life Below Water
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development.

NAME: Life on Land
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss.

NAME: Peace, Justice, and Strong Institutions
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels.

NAME: Partnerships for the Goals
SHORT_DESCRIPTION__C: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development.
